meanings.definition: theorbists: plural noun, individuals who play the theorbo
meanings.sent1: The theorbists gathered in the music room to practice together.
meanings.sent2: Many theorbists performed at the concert last night.
meanings.sent3: The theorbists had a friendly competition to see who could play the theorbo the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The theorbists' fingers danced on the strings of their instruments like skilled artists.
meanings.sent5: The theorbists' passion for the theorbo was evident in every note they played.

meanings.definition: theorbists: plural noun, experts in the field of theorbo music and history
meanings.sent1: The theorbists shared their knowledge about theorbo music with the students.
meanings.sent2: Historians often consult theorbists when researching the history of the theorbo.
meanings.sent3: The theorbists' deep understanding of theorbo music made them popular among music enthusiasts.
meanings.sent4: The theorbists' expertise in theorbo history was unmatched in the academic world.
meanings.sent5: The theorbists' dedication to preserving the legacy of theorbo music was commendable.
